General.Name: Redrow PLC
General.Description: Redrow plc focuses on housebuilding activities in the United Kingdom. It is involved in acquiring land; and develops and sells residential housing properties. Redrow plc was founded in 1974 and is based in Flintshire, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Redrow House, Flintshire, United Kingdom, CH5 3RX
